rows.label: qst720303_msg0001
rows.name:
A fire-spewing monster. It's a good
thing we had Wadatsumi on hand!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0002
rows.name:
Perhaps it's bold of me to say, but I've
dealt with worse.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, it seems safe to assume that this
was the cause of the burn marks.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0004
rows.name:
I would never have dreamed that such
a foul fiend could have lain in wait so
close to Torigo.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe it was driven out of its original
home in a territorial dispute. I've heard
that happens from time to time.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0006
rows.name:
Yeah, maybe. Or more likely, some
human stole or smashed its home up.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0007
rows.name:
We call them monsters... But to them,
we're the monsters.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0009
rows.name:
The day shall dawn where man's
exploitation of the Divine Beasts will bring
us all to ruin.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0010
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps that dawn is already upon us...
